snippet.title: Towers of Aghasba - Extended Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Explore. Build. Grow. Connect.

Rebuild your civilization and restore exotic ecosystems on your own fantasy island.

Experience an upcoming open-world builder unlike any other in TOWERS OF AGHASBA!

Coming 2024.

Wishlist on Steam now: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2178070/Towers_of_Aghasba/!

Website: https://www.dreamlit.games

Follow us on all our socials!
- Discord: https://discord.com/invite/TyXqTWNcmf
- Twitter: https://twitter.com/DreamlitGames
- Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/DreamlitGames
- Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/dreamlitgames/
- Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/Towers_Game/
- LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/company/dreamlit-games/

#TowersOfAghasba #TowersGame #gaming
